constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 134 (Friday, July 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. OMAR:
H.R. 4894.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section I
[Page H4307]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Reform, and in addition to the Committees on the Budget, Education and Labor, Ways and Means, and Financial Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: GPI Act of 2021
